thread.title: Moon Geun Young’s Agency Shares Update On The Actress’ Condition
thread.title_full: Moon Geun Young’s Agency Shares Update On The Actress’ Condition

author: notclaira
title: Moon Geun Young’s Agency Shares Update On The Actress’ Condition
text:
After undergoing her third surgery for Acute Compartment Syndrome, Moon Geun Young is in recovery. 
On February 23, a source from Namoo Actors, the actress’ agency, said, “Moon Geun Young is still receiving inpatient treatment. It has not yet been decided whether she needs to undergo further surgery. Her discharge date is also still up in the air.” 
On February 1, Moon Geun Young complained of a sudden pain in her right arm and on the following day she was checked in to a hospital for emergency surgery . She was diagnosed with Acute Compartment Syndrome and had to cancel her appearances in the provincial tour of “Romeo and Juliet.”
